channel.description: Recent content in Business on c13u's Blog

item.title: Economics in the Real World
item.description: Non-Competitiveness of Local Industry [] Prestige Ameritech is America’s #1 maker of surgical masks. In outbreaks, demand peaks, but when it’s all over, hospitals go back to exclusively buying cheaper masks from China. Reduced demand makes Ameritech lay off workers. Ameritech is pushing for a federal contract to stabilize demand over time. Index Funds Reducing Market Effectiveness [] Scenario: Company A has novel brand-name drug, poised to sell 10m pills @ $100 = $1b revenue.
